IOT.IOTServer

Class IOTServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • IOT.IOTServer.IOTServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOTServerInterface

    public class IOTServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOTServerInterface
    This class handles logical IOT requests.
    Version:
    Milestone1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private IOTApplicationInterface application
      A reference to the instance of Application running on this node.
      private IOTClientInterface client
      A reference to the instance of Client running on this node.
      private SubscriberList subscribers
      A list of all currently known subscribers to whom messages can be forwarded.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new instance of server.

      This method receives a UDP Service Offering package and analyzes its content.
      void subscribeRequestHandler(java.lang.String destinationIP, int destinationPort)
      This method creates a new subscriber and sets its ip and port attributes, and hands it over to the Subscriber list for storing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IOTServer

        public IOTServer(SubscriberList pSubscribers,
                 IOTClientInterface pClient,
                 IOTApplicationInterface pApplication)
        Creates a new instance of server. This constructor is only called once in a servlet's lifetime.
        Parameters:
        pSubscribers - An (at first empty) list of subscribers for this node.
        pClient - A reference to the instance of Client running on this node.
        pApplication - A reference to the instance of Application running on this node.

    • Method Detail

      • receiveServiceOffering

        public void receiveServiceOffering(java.net.InetAddress sourceAddress,
                                   java.lang.String data)
        This method receives a UDP Service Offering package and analyzes its content. If it is interested in the Service it tells the Client to sent a subscription request.
        Specified by:
        receiveServiceOffering in interface IOTServerInterface
        Parameters:
        sourceAddress - The IP-address of where the offering came from.
        data - The data contained within the service offering.

      • subscribeRequestHandler

        public void subscribeRequestHandler(java.lang.String destinationIP,
                                    int destinationPort)
        This method creates a new subscriber and sets its ip and port attributes, and hands it over to the Subscriber list for storing.
        Specified by:
        subscribeRequestHandler in interface IOTServerInterface
        Parameters:
        destinationIP - The IP of the node instered in the service.
        destinationPort - The port of the node interested in the service.

      • incomingNotificationHandler

        public void incomingNotificationHandler(IOTMessage message)
        This method passes incoming notifications on to the application.
        Specified by:
        incomingNotificationHandler in interface IOTServerInterface
        Parameters:
        message - The message received from an outside source.
